0.1.name: wordpress/hackadelic-mutliblog-kit
0.1.description:
The plugin download page has changed. Please head over to the new download page The download here will be removed soon.

This plugin assists with the creation of multi-blogs on top of Virtual Multiblog, so that all blogs are powered by a single WordPress code base. It also assists with proper Virtual Multiblog setup.

Check out the plug-in homepage for in-depth information about the plug-in.

Change Log

0.1 - Initial public beta release.

Attention: This version should be handled as a public beta. It has only been tested with a standard WordPress installation, and a default wp-config.php file, and it works well under those conditions. It may have issues with a manually tweaked wp-config.php tho
